name: Cheesequest Uber Early Alpha Demo
description:
This is a game I decided to try making in GameMaker-I wouldn't pay for it. It's more of a really early alpha of a game which probably will be discontinued, so I'll just put it out there. If anyone wants to help with development, then ask, and I'll see if I can get you designing levels.

NEXT UPDATE WILL HAVE AN INTENSE GRAPHICS OVERHAUL, AND HOPEFULLY SOME NEW LEVELS.

POSSIBLE FUTURE ADDITIONS:

-More levels. Note that the third level is unbeatable.

-'pie" varient.

-Better music, hopefully. (does anyone want to write me some music? :3)

-Hostiles

-More hazards

-Moving crap

FEEDBACK APPRECIATED, ALTHOUGH ADMITTEDLY THERE ISN'T MUCH IN THE GAME YET.
